title.narrative: Digital Development Partnership Multi-Donor Trust Fund

description.narrative: The partnership makes digital solutions available to developing countries with an emphasis on the fol-lowing areas: 1) data and indicators; 2) digital economy enabling environment; 3) cybersecurity; 4) internet access for all; 5) digital government and 6) mainstreaming digital services, solutions, and platforms. In addition, a softly earmarked contribution is made through the DDP towards a drone project in Tanzania, of which the key results are 1) testing of the use of cargo drones for civilian use; 2) preparing stakeholders, identify the opportunities and risks in the use of drones for transport; 3) creating a plat-form for knowledge exchange, networking and partnerships on the use of cargo drones in Africa. In Tanzania, the Mwanza and Lake Victoria region has become a prime location for testing drones as a means of fast transport. The regional authorities in Mwanza, in collaboration with the World Bank, wish to test cargo drones.
